mapper.insert: insert into capital_receivable (delivery_time, customer, salesmen, receivables, received, uncollected, remarks, case_state, receipt_remark, last_collection_time) values (#{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{received,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uncollected,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiptRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastCollectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update capital_receivable
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salesmen = #{salesmen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receivables = #{receivables,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

receipt_remark = #{receiptRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_collection_time = #{lastCollectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where delivery_id = #{deliveryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
